properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 3:10PM EST until January 18 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations
of 4 to 7 inches. Southeast winds gusting as high as 35 mph will
create areas of blowing and drifting snow.

* WHERE...Southern Oneida county.

* WHEN...Steady snow quickly overspreads the area midday Saturday
and continues into the evening hours. Snow tapers off to snow
showers by late evening.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing
snow could significantly reduce visibility.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates around 1 inch per hour are
possible at times. Temperatures start off around 20 degrees
then slowly rise to around 30 later Saturday evening.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 10 PM EST SATURDAY
